title: Samir Si Hadj Mohand
text:
Samir Si Hadj Mohand (born July 16, 1982) is an Algerian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He currently plays for <a href="CA%20Bordj%20Bou%20Arr%C3%A9ridj">CA Bordj Bou Arréridj</a> in the <a href="Algerian%20Ligue%20Professionnelle%202">Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 2</a>.
Club career.
Si Hadj Mohand began his career in the junior ranks of his hometown club of <a href="JSM%20B%C3%A9ja%C3%AFa">JSM Béjaïa</a>. During his time with the club, he won the Junior Algerian Cup, for the first time in the club's history.
In 2007, Si Hadj Mohand joined <a href="MO%20B%C3%A9ja%C3%AFa">MO Béjaïa</a>, where he played for the next two seasons.
In the summer of 2009, he joined <a href="AS%20Khroub">AS Khroub</a>. On August 8, 2009, he made his debut for the club as a starter in a league game against <a href="ES%20S%C3%A9tif">ES Sétif</a>.
